nodes.text: The term Chamberlain could apply to a variety of governing positions, often in place of a monarch or in control of a large jurisdiction.
The Sith, during the Jedi Civil War, also had a chamberlain by the name of Adrenas who would look after maintenance and supply in the Sith Academy on Korriban.
The Chamberlain was the planetary leader of Munto Codru, most notably Iyon.
In 40 ABY Lady Galney from Hapes Consortium was a chamberlain to Queen Mother Tenel Ka Djo. In the end of the same year Lady Aros was chamberlain to Tenel Ka.
